docs.snippet: The first Brazilian bank that fails may collapse the whole house of cards built on the country's inflated economy, Oliver E. Zimmerman, regional export manager, General Poods Corporation, declared yesterday. Addressing the Export Manag-ers Club at...
docs.lead_paragraph: The first Brazilian bank that fails may collapse the whole house of cards built on the country's inflated economy, Oliver E. Zimmerman, regional export manager, General Poods Corporation, declared yesterday. Addressing the Export Manag-ers Club at the Hotel Pennsylvania, he said once Brazil has gone.through the deflation spiral, it will be the outstanding trading country of Latin America.
docs.abstract: O E Zimmerman repts on econ stability

headline.main: WARNS INFLATION IS THREAT IN BRAZIL; Zimmerman Tells Export Men Once Situation Is Adjusted Good Market Looms There

docs.snippet: Abraham H. Feller, general counsel and director of the legal department of the United Nations, interpreted yesterday the bigpower veto in the Security Council as a sign that most of the nations of the world have relinquished an important part of...
docs.lead_paragraph: Abraham H. Feller, general counsel and director of the legal department of the United Nations, interpreted yesterday the bigpower veto in the Security Council as a sign that most of the nations of the world have relinquished an important part of their sovereignty.

headline.main: WORLD BAR GROUP BEGINS ACTIVITIES; U.N. Counsel Says 50 of the 55 Lands Already Have Yielded Part of Sovereignty

docs.snippet: An almost untapped market exists in Latin America for American exporters of machinery, construction materials, hardware and electrical equipment, according to an annual survey covering approximately 6,000 trade inquiries which has just been completed...
docs.lead_paragraph: An almost untapped market exists in Latin America for American exporters of machinery, construction materials, hardware and electrical equipment, according to an annual survey covering approximately 6,000 trade inquiries which has just been completed by the Council for Inter-American Cooperation.
docs.abstract: Issues annual survey of Latin-Amer market

headline.main: VAST MARKET SEEN IN LATIN AMERICA; Study Shows Almost Untapped Outlet for U.S. Machinery, Hardware, Other Items
